archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.5.8: Threat events associated with the 'exploiting information' stage of the cyber attack chain (e.g. money laundering, counterfeiting of products, benefiting from stolen intellectual property or identity theft) should be identified and addressed by:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
